QueryToExecute:
select
  arn as resource,
  case
    when kms_key_id is null then 'alarm'
    else 'ok'
  end as status,
  case
    when kms_key_id is null then title || ' encryption at rest disabled.'
    else title || ' encryption at rest enabled.'
  end as reason
  
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_sagemaker_endpoint_configuration;
